meanings.definition: A device used to charge a battery or electronic device.
meanings.sent1: I plugged in my charger to power up my phone.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to bring your charger when traveling.
meanings.sent3: The charger was feeling tired after a long day of charging.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a charger, bringing energy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The charger hummed softly as it worked its magic on the dead battery.

meanings.sent1: The charger at the store was friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The charger of the group led the way to the top of the hill.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a charger, collecting imaginary fees from her toys.
meanings.sent4: His words were a charger, inspiring us to take action.
meanings.sent5: The charger's determination was like a beacon, guiding others towards success.
